bod:
Read Omly Mamories is a gam set in the yeer 2064 whish is like all scyber pumk an there is like relly good VEE URR which hucks into ur brain an there are like loads of roobuts dat run on a operation sistem an they are alle cunnected with each otter by lik teh imternet or somethin. Everybuddy is also like half aminal or somthin but theere are ppl whoarent and hayte teh pepel who ar an they proetest an thee disliek robots too.
In thiz gam I was a cool reviewser whoo waz reviewink a pear of hedfones but my fren got kindnaped an his fren who he maed who was a rombot who could thimk like a hyuomen decedided to waek me up and we go on a search 4 his makeer.
The stoary in these game waz a aemaezingk aned it was played by using thee mouse to clike on thinks and like do things and there was som likee grosse gome off malk an it was likee impotant 2 tha storee whisch was achuall like totelly fonney an I really injoyed it.The robot fren in the gam was calleed Turing who is also teh nam ofe teh guy who like made the firset laptop. Turing is lik my faverite carachter abd and was like funnney and he was like cute. It es now liek miy faver gaem I'de ever plaeyed, Thank for makin it person whou made it boy!!
